descriptionHtml:
Modification:
Alternative texture for the Shield of Ysgramor.
I have added some scratches and in my opinion more credible metal.
Especially the inner surface is in more detail than the blurry original hd version.

I hope you can much more enjoy this unique shield now. ^^
Thanks for feedback.

Installation:
1. unpack the rar file
2. choose between 1024x1024 (for older pc) or 2048x2048 (for high end pc)
3. copy the texture folder in folder Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data



kxperience
author: k-xperience
